nodes.text: Hondu Firewell was a Human male from the planet Corulag. He and his wife Tattyra were both zoologists, and they had a son named Klay.

In 23 BBY, the Firewell family took a trip to Fondor's jungle-moon of Nallastia to study its fauna, but they were mistaken for poachers and imprisoned by Princess Calvaria. They were only rescued when a Jedi team was able to find the Lost Stars of Nallastia, after which they returned to Corulag.
